about_the_game:
This product is the world's first artifical intelligent noval game.

This game is adapted from one of China's Four Great Classical Novels, "Dream of the Red Chamber".
The game will encompass all 120 chapters compiled by Cao Xueqin and Gao E, striving to faithfully recreate the entirety of the original work.
The game features 4K high-definition images with a realistic artistic style. It includes voice acting based on real people throughout and original copyrighted songs.

Legal Disclaimer


This game has been registered for copyright in China. Legal action will be taken against infringement.

Game Community


Discussion groups for the game:
Waiting for come

Game Features


At the end of each chapter in the game, there are carefully crafted questions to test players' understanding of the storylines.
The game features 4K high-definition images with a realistic artistic style. It includes voice acting based on real people throughout and original copyrighted songs.
In the later stages of the game, based on other versions of "Dream of the Red Chamber", players will have choices affecting the storyline as Jia Baoyu or other characters. Each choice will have a certain impact on the plot, aligning with the described branching storylines in other versions of "Dream of the Red Chamber".

Game Content


The game will encompass all 120 chapters compiled by Cao Xueqin and Gao E, striving to faithfully recreate the entirety of the original work "Dream of the Red Chamber".

Significance of the Game

The narrative of the Jia and Zhen families depicted in "Dream of the Red Chamber" is a microcosm of life in ancient China and represents the pinnacle of ancient Chinese novels.
This work can serve as a reference for students and scholars to familiarize themselves with "Dream of the Red Chamber".
We welcome scholars of "Dream of the Red Chamber" from all fields to discuss and progress together.
